pages.text: 15|92|Eteke tomara pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya ami sihamta sakaloke jeraa karaima
15|94|Eteke tumi yi bisaye adesapraapta haicha seya prakasyabharae pracara karaa arau musbaraikasakalara paraa mukha ghuraa'i loraa.
15|95|Niscaya bidraupakaraisakalara biraud'dhe amiye'i tomara babe yathesta
15|96|yisakale allahara lagata ana kono upasya nirdharana karae. Niscaya atisighrae'i (iyara parainama) sihamte janiba paraiba.
15|97|Arau arasye ami e'i katha jano ye, sihamtara kathata tomara mana sankucita haya
15|98|eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara tachabiha patha karaa arau chajadahakarai sakalara antarbhukta horaa.
15|99|Arau tomara mrtyu naha laike tumi tomara pratipalakara ibadata karaa.
16|1|Allahara adesa ahiba'i; eteke se'ito pabalai kharakheda nakaraiba. Te'om ati paraitra mahimamaya arau sihamte yi ansidara sthapana karae tara paraa te'om (bahu) urd'dhata.

16|2|Te'om nija bandasakalara majata yara prati iccha nija nirdesata rauha (ahisaha phiraista) praerana karae e'i buli ye, tomaloke satarka karaa, ma'i bine ana kono satya ilaha na'i; seye tomaloke mora takbaraa aralambana karaa.
16|3|Teraemi yathayathabharae akasasamuha arau prthirai srsti karaiche; sihamte yi ansidara sthapana karae te'om tara paraa (bahu) urd'dhata.
16|4|Teraemi manuhaka sukrakitara paraa srsti karaiche; athaca coraa, se'i manuhe'i prakasya bitandakarai
16|5|arau catuspada jantubora teraemi srsti karaiche, tomalokara babe tata ache sita nibaranara upakarana lagate arau nana dharanara upakara ache arau se'iborara kichumanaka tomaloke bhaksano karaa.
16|6|Arau tomalokara babe ache tata saundarya, yetiya tomaloke caraabalai puraara bhagata se'iboraka khedi niya arau yetiya sandhiya (patharara paraa) gharalai lai aha.
